BR.name: Thorium Wars: Attack of the Skyfighter
BR.description: A humanidade pensou que a vitória na guerra contra os Thorions, uma raça de máquinas de guerra destemidas e descontroladas, devolveria a paz à Terra. Mas, passada uma geração, o pior medo da humanidade se realizou: os Thorions retornaram, buscando vingança e a erradicação da raça humana numa missão para dominar a galáxia. Cabe a você ir ao ataque contra os Thorions e derrotá-los mais uma vez em batalha. Escolha entre três Skyfighters para pilotar através de mundos alienígenas, para proteger colônias humanas e destruir as forças de Thorion. Descarregue suas armas em mechas gigantescos, torres de artilharia e enxames de drones. Coloque à prova os limites da sua técnica de combate contra os hábeis Skyfighters de Thorion.

CA.name: Thorium Wars: Attack of the Skyfighter
CA.description: Humanity thought that its victory in the war with the Thorions, a race of fearless war machines run amok, would restore peace to the Earth. But a generation later, humanity's worst fear is realized: the Thorions have returned, seeking revenge and aiming to wipe out the human race in a quest to dominate the galaxy. It's up to you to go on the attack against the Thorions and defeat them in battle once more. Pilot your choice of three Skyfighters across alien worlds to protect human colonies and destroy Thorion forces. Blast away at hulking mechs, menacing gun turrets, and swarming drones. Push your dogfighting skills to their limits against adept Thorion Skyfighters.

MX.name: Thorium Wars: Attack of the Skyfighter
MX.description: La humanidad creyó que la victoria en la guerra contra los Thorions, una raza de impávidas máquinas de guerra desenfrenadas, restauraría la paz en la Tierra. Pero una generación después, el peor temor de la humanidad se volvió una realidad: Los Thorions han regresado, en busca de venganza y con intención de eliminar la raza humana de la faz de la Tierra para luego dominar la galaxia. Depende de ti ir contra los Thorions y derrotarlos en batalla una vez más. Elige entre los tres aerodeslizadores para atravesar los mundos alienígenas, proteger las colonias humanas y destruir las fuerzas de los Thorions. Destruye las enormes mechas, las amenazantes torretas de armas y las multitudes de drones. Lleva tus habilidades aéreas al límite contra los habilidosos luchadores del aire Thorions.

US.name: Thorium Wars: Attack of the Skyfighter
US.description: Humanity thought that its victory in the war with the Thorions, a race of fearless war machines run amok, would restore peace to the Earth. But a generation later, humanity's worst fear is realized: the Thorions have returned, seeking revenge and aiming to wipe out the human race in a quest to dominate the galaxy. It's up to you to go on the attack against the Thorions and defeat them in battle once more. Pilot your choice of three Skyfighters across alien worlds to protect human colonies and destroy Thorion forces. Blast away at hulking mechs, menacing gun turrets, and swarming drones. Push your dogfighting skills to their limits against adept Thorion Skyfighters.
